io.atomix.protocols.raft

Interface RaftClient


  • public interface RaftClient
    Provides an interface for submitting operations to the Raft cluster.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  RaftClient.Builder
      Builds a new Raft client.

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        static RaftClient.Builder builder()
        Returns a new Raft client builder.

        The provided set of members will be used to connect to the Raft cluster. The members list does not have to represent the complete list of servers in the cluster, but it must have at least one reachable member that can communicate with the cluster's leader.

        Returns:
        The client builder.

      • builder

        static RaftClient.Builder builder(MemberId... cluster)
        Returns a new Raft client builder.

        The provided set of members will be used to connect to the Raft cluster. The members list does not have to represent the complete list of servers in the cluster, but it must have at least one reachable member that can communicate with the cluster's leader.

        Parameters:
        cluster - The cluster to which to connect.
        Returns:
        The client builder.

      • builder

        static RaftClient.Builder builder(Collection<MemberId> cluster)
        Returns a new Raft client builder.

        The provided set of members will be used to connect to the Raft cluster. The members list does not have to represent the complete list of servers in the cluster, but it must have at least one reachable member that can communicate with the cluster's leader.

        Parameters:
        cluster - The cluster to which to connect.
        Returns:
        The client builder.

      • connect

        default CompletableFuture<RaftClient> connect()
        Connects the client to Raft cluster via the default server address.

        If the client was built with a default cluster list, the default server addresses will be used. Otherwise, the client will attempt to connect to localhost:8700.

        The client will connect to servers in the cluster according to the pattern specified by the configured CommunicationStrategy.

        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed once the client is registered.

      • connect

        default CompletableFuture<RaftClient> connect(MemberId... members)
        Connects the client to Raft cluster via the provided server addresses.

        The client will connect to servers in the cluster according to the pattern specified by the configured CommunicationStrategy.

        Parameters:
        members - A set of server addresses to which to connect.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed once the client is registered.

      • connect

        CompletableFuture<RaftClient> connect(Collection<MemberId> members)
        Connects the client to Raft cluster via the provided server addresses.

        The client will connect to servers in the cluster according to the pattern specified by the configured CommunicationStrategy.

        Parameters:
        members - A set of server addresses to which to connect.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed once the client is registered.

      • close

        CompletableFuture<Void> close()
        Closes the client.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed once the client has been closed.
